import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Logo from './Logo' import LogoTitle from '../../assets/images/logo-s.png' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' const Home = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const nameArray = 'li Nafees'.split('') const jobArray = 'Cloud Architect & Security Engineer'.split('') useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 2500) return () => clearTimeout(timer) }, []) return ( <>

H i There,
I 'm

Streamlining Workflows | Deploying Scalable & Secure Systems

{/* Buttons Wrapper */}
CONTACT ME DOWNLOAD RESUME
) } export default Home
